summary: REQ-23 appears implemented in ProgramDetailDrawer by adding composed Tailwind animation/transition classes to SheetContent, including fade + directional slide for desktop (right) vs mobile (bottom) and reduced-motion handling. No evidence of edits under frontend/src/components/ui. Two additional non-functional metadata files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository metadata/summary files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) even though the request only asked for a UI animation change in ProgramDetailDrawer.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not part of REQ-23 and are not necessary to implement the drawer transition behavior.
